project_name.justification: The title of the article is "BrightRock Gold Corp. Announces The Expansion of The Midnight Owl Lithium Project, Increasing Ownership from 197 to 237 Lode Claims".

company_name.justification: The article begins with "BrightRock Gold Corp. (OTC PINK:BRGC) is pleased to announce an additional 20% expansion of its existing footprint at the Midnight Owl Lithium Project."

ceo_buyer.justification: The text states: "BrightRock's chief executive officer, Mac J. Shahsavar, P.Eng., commented on the completed expansion project..."

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The article describes an expansion of claims for a project the company already owns, not an acquisition of interest from another party. The text states: "BrightRock Gold Corp. holds 100% ownership and interest in the 'Midnight Owl Mine,'..."

primary_commodity.justification: The project is named the "Midnight Owl Lithium Project" and the company is described as "a lithium exploration company".

verified_article_link.justification: The article is about the specified project, the Midnight Owl Lithium Project, as indicated by the title and content.

currency.justification: The article does not mention any financial transaction, so no currency is specified.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The article describes a project expansion through claim staking, not an acquisition involving cash consideration.

share_payments_raw.justification: The article describes a project expansion through claim staking, not an acquisition involving share consideration.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The article describes a project expansion through claim staking, not an acquisition involving a combined cash and share consideration.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: No shares were issued as part of this project expansion.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants were mentioned as part of this project expansion.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options were mentioned as part of this project expansion.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued as part of this transaction, so there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No exploration commitment in meters was mentioned in the article.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: No monetary exploration commitment was mentioned in the article.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) was acquired or retained as part of this project expansion.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text states: "Approximately 4,900 acres are now divided between 237 lode claims, each with full ownership rights."

coverage_area_unit.justification: The text states: "Approximately 4,900 acres are now divided between 237 lode claims, each with full ownership rights."

resource_size.justification: The text mentions "potentially extensive lithium mineralization" but does not provide a quantified mineral resource estimate with mass or volume units (e.g., tonnes, ounces).

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The text identifies the company as "BrightRock Gold Corp. (OTC PINK:BRGC)" and the detailed quote section specifies the exchange as "Exchange: OTCPK".
